title: Ethereum Python Speedrun
description: An interactive and beginner-friendly on-ramp to Ethereum for Python developers, hosted by the EF Python team. Quickly get up to speed with fundamental building blocks, then stack them into live applications. After some blockchain basics (e.g., accounts, transactions, smart contracts), you'll ease into intermediate topics, like event subscriptions and message signing. By the end of this workshop, you'll have a clear idea of how to get your own projects off the ground.
